description: In this course we will explore the role and depiction of religion in Indian cinema. We will view and discuss films from a number of different languages and genres, including early mythologicals, south Indian goddess films, courtesan films, historicals, and animated epicsjust to name a few. We will be interest ed. in such themes as Indian cinemas portrayal of religious minorities, Hindu-Muslim conflict, and Hindu nationalism.In order to better understand the role of cinema in Indian religious culture (and society more broadly), our viewings of films will be supplemented by readings which will help put these films into context. Films in Hindi, Tamil and Telugu will be screened with subtitiles.
